description:
When I listened to Dante talk about bondage role playing, I knew he would get off to being tied-up and made to do things.
But when he came in to do his solo and possibly a Serviced video, I felt like I was baiting and switching him by changing gears from Serviced to an Edge video. So for this one, I keep my clothes on. I didn't want to push his limits too far.
Dante liked the idea of a little cock tease and normally I use a flimsy shoe string to tie the guys up. He wanted it as real as it could get.
When we initially talked about him doing more gigs, he said he would likely be up for anything but bottoming. I really like his Italian vibe and want him to be versatile. So I really focused on trying to show him his ass didn't have to be off limits.
Pretty certain that he enjoyed the whole Edge experience and will be back for more!
title: Bryan & Dante - Edge
